item.title: Roblox: Octopus Game Codes (February 2025)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Octopus Game Codes
  • How to Redeem Codes for Octopus Game
  • How to Get More Octopus Game Codes

Octopus Game is a well-made Roblox adaptation of the Netflix show Squid Game , where you can take part in survival games against other players. Just like in the show, you can win a cool prize, which is a decent amount of Cash, a game currency that you can spend on buying skins or additional game options.

Besides, you can also earn Cash by redeeming Octopus Game codes. In addition to a ton of currency, you'll also get other useful rewards, such as an Outfit Case that you can open to get a unique outfit.

Updated February 18, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: A fresh batch of codes has just dropped, bringing more Cash and Outfit Cases to claim. You can find the new additions below, alongside all other active codes. Don’t miss out.

All Octopus Game Codes

Working Octopus Game Codes

  • XD - Redeem this code to get Cash and Outfit Case. (NEW)
  • REBELLIONUPDATE - Redeem this code to get Cash and Outfit Case. (NEW)
  • 25MVISITS - Redeem this code to get Cash and Outfit Case. (NEW)
  • HEREHAVETHECODEFOR600K - Redeem this code to get Cash and Outfit Case. (NEW)
  • FREESKINS1 - Redeem this code to get Outfit Case.
  • Freemoney1 - Redeem this code to get 350,000 Cash.

Expired Octopus Game Codes

  • 500KGROUPMEMBERS - Redeem this code to get 500,000 Cash and Outfit Case.
  • SOSOSORRYFORTHEBUGS - Redeem this code to get 400,000 Cash.

Redeeming Octopus Game сodes is a great way to quickly get Cash if you can't earn it in games. So, if you are saving up for a new costume or weapon skin, or even for the opportunity to play as a security guard, so be sure to use the codes.

How to Redeem Codes for Octopus Game

Octopus Game developers took care of newcomers and made the redemption system simple and clear to fans who have played other Roblox games, so that everyone could understand how it works. We have also created a step-by-step guide on how to do it so that you don't waste any time:

  • Launch Octopus Game .
  • Pay attention to the left side of the screen. There will be two buttons. Among them, interact with the one that says Shop.
  • In the Shop menu, scroll to the bottom. Here you will find the pink redemption section.
  • In the input field, enter one of the working codes from the list above.
  • Lastly, click on the green Redeem button next to the input field to submit your reward request.

If everything is done correctly, a notification will appear on the screen with a list of rewards received.

How to Get More Octopus Game Codes

Octopus Game has a large audience, and the game developers take care of it by frequently sharing new Roblox promo codes. You can always find them both on this page as well as on the official pages of the game:

  • Official Octopus Game Roblox group.
  • Official Octopus Game Discord server.

item.title: Roblox: Sword Clashers Codes (February 2025)
item.description:
In , players will have to fight waves of enemies and unlock new worlds. But of course, at first, your character will be quite weak. And to increase their stats, you will have to train a lot. Fortunately, with the help of Sword Clashers codes you will speed up your progress significantly.

Just a few codes will reward you with a lot of useful items. This includes both currencies and unique weapons. But if you do not want to miss out on these goodies, you should use Roblox codes before they expire.

Updated February 19, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: All currently available codes can be found below. If any new ones are released, this page will be updated accordingly, so be sure to check back regularly.

All Sword Clashers Codes

Working Sword Clashers Codes

  • Halloween - Redeem this code to get 2 Pumpkin Eggs.
  • howdy - Redeem this code to get Gems.
  • upsidedown - Redeem this code to get Gems.
  • indagrass - Redeem this code to get Gems.
  • lookup - Redeem this code to get Gems.
  • spike - Redeem this code to get Gems.
  • silo - Redeem this code to get Gems.
  • molten - Redeem this code to get Gems.
  • supportbeam - Redeem this code to get Gems.
  • doofus - Redeem this code to get Gems.
  • Timber - Redeem this code to get a Timber Axe Sword
  • Release - Redeem this code to get 50 Gems and a Shiny Treat

Expired Sword Clashers Codes

There are no expired codes in Sword Clashers . We will update this article as soon as more codes become available.

Sword Clashers gameplay is similar to other RPGs on the platform. Players need to train on dummies to increase their damage, and then fight enemies to earn Wins. The latter are needed to unlock new worlds and hatch pets. In addition, you can find weapons with better damage multipliers. But the best way to get weapons easily is Sword Clashers codes.

Each of the codes contains useful items and even Gems. With their help, you can make your character much stronger, especially in the early stages of the game. But you should hurry since each code has a short validity period.

How to Redeem Sword Clashers Codes

Fortunately, using codes in Sword Clashers is no more difficult than in other Roblox experiences. But if you are a little confused by the abundance of HUD elements, then follow these simple steps:

  • First, of course, launch Sword Clashers .
  • Then, open the settings. To do this, players can click on the gear icon in the lower-left corner of the screen.
  • After that, go to the Redeem tab.
  • Finally, enter the code and click the Redeem! button to get free goodies.

How to Get More Sword Clashers Codes

Since the developers do not release many Sword Clashers codes, they are very valuable. Therefore, we recommend that you follow the developers' social media, so as not to miss the release of free rewards. In addition to Roblox codes, on these pages, you will find news about upcoming updates.

  • TBlox Studios X page
  • TBlox Studios Discord server
  • TBlox Mini Roblox group

item.title: Fortnite: All Midas Skins, Ranked
item.description:
Fortnite 's storyline started solidifying around Chapter 1 Season 4, and since then, it has only gotten more and more complex. Over this time, some characters established themselves as iconic, and Midas is undoubtedly one of them.

Midas first appeared in Fortnite in Chapter 2 Season 2. Players who purchased the Battle Pass could unlock the Midas skin by reaching Level 100 in Fortnite . Since then, he has emerged many times and Epic Games has even come up with several Midas variants for fans who wanted to see more of the infamous gold-covered man.

7 Icebound Midas

Part of the Black Ice Set

  • Release date: December 23, 2021
  • Price: 2,500 V-Bucks (Black Ice Legends pack)

The Frozen Legends pack was a success when it was released back in 2018, and it led to the creation of several more ice-themed cosmetics in Fortnite . Many fan-favorite skins, such as Peely and Midas, got a frozen variant. Peely's frozen variant, Polar Peely, looks awesome, and Icebound Midas is not half-bad either.

The icy-white eyes are quite menacing and the frozen details on his outfit look stunning. However, compared to all of the Midas cosmetics available in Fortnite , this one isn't as memorable as the others, and gamers have to spend a considerable amount of V-Bucks to get it.

6 Golden Gear Midas

Part of the Anime Legends Set

  • Release date: October 14, 2022
  • Price: $19.99 (Anime Legends pack)

Golden Gear Midas is part of the Anime Legends pack, alongside Ricochet Rox, and Ready Penny. This Midas variant isn't reactive and won't gradually turn gold with more eliminations. However, it has an additional style with its helmet on.

If we compare it to the price of a V-Bucks Card, $19.99 is worth 2,800 V-Bucks. It doesn't sound like much when it comes to Item Shop cosmetics because it includes three skins, but unless gamers like the other skins included in the Anime Legends packs, Golden Gear Midas isn't worth its price tag.

5 Midsummer Midas

Part of the Undercover Summer Set

  • Release date: June 24, 2021
  • Price: 1,600 V-Bucks

Midsummer Midas is the right skin for the hotter months of the year. Every Fortnite hosts a summer event riddled with quests and freebies, and if gamers want their skin to be in sync with the atmosphere, Midsummer Midas is a great choice.

The 1,600 V-Bucks price tag on Midsummer Midas isn't that bad, especially considering players can toggle customizations on and off and dress him up according to their preferences. Midsummer Midas can have his jacket and glasses on or off. Additionally, gamers can also enable or disable his reactive gold effect.

4 Midas Rex

Part of the Last Laugh Set

  • Release date: November 18, 2020
  • Price: $29.99 (The Last Laugh bundle)

In order to obtain Midas Rex in Fortnite , gamers have to acquire The Last Laugh bundle, which features two skins from the DC Series: The Joker and Poison Ivy. The Last Laugh bundle is perfect for DC fans who want to get cool cosmetics based on their favorite characters, but if that wasn't enough, they also get an awesome Midas skin on top of that.

Midas looks particularly tough in his full helmet gear, but if gamers want to show off the face behind the mask, they can select the default Midas Rex style.

3 Shadow Midas

Part of the ShadeChaser Set

  • Release date: October 29, 2021
  • Price: 1,500 V-Bucks

Shadow Midas came out during Chapter 2 Season 8, a few seasons following the release of the original Midas skin. This is one of the most underrated Midas skins out there, as gamers won't see it very often when playing Fortnite .

Players who missed out on Midas when it was available should consider the Shadow Midas skin, as it is equally as elegant, but features a dark and more mysterious reactive effect - the purple shadows that surround it.

2 Ascendant Midas

Part of the Golden King Set

  • Release date: March 27, 2024
  • Price: 2,000 V-Bucks

Ascendant Midas was released during Chapter 5 Season 2, Fortnite Myths & Mortals, a Greek mythology-inspired season. This variant of Midas fit into the lore of the season and had one of the most interesting stories to tell.

Midas was locked in a cell in Hade's Underworld but managed to escape, thus creating the Ascendant Midas persona, the ultimate golden king in Fortnite . This skin can turn gold, but it also has a "Shade" style, which gives it an Underworld Dash-like effect.

1 Midas

Part of the Golden Ghost Set

  • Release date: February 20, 2020
  • Price: 950 V-Bucks (Chapter 2 Season 2 Battle Pass)

The OG Midas skin takes the top spot on this list, as it is hard to beat the king himself. Midas has various select style options but his classic look has become iconic, so that is what most players tend to stick with. Regardless, they can choose between the default style, Golden Agent, or Team GHOST and Team SHADOW styles, depending on what they chose back in Chapter 1.

Unfortunately, gamers who didn't complete the Chapter 2 Season 2 Battle Pass when it was live have no way to obtain the Midas skin.

item.title: Roblox: Crusaders Codes (February 2025)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Crusaders Codes
  • How to Redeem Crusaders Codes
  • How to Get More Crusaders Codes

Crusaders is one of the representatives of the dungeon crawler games. In it, players have to take out enemies in various dungeons and look for treasure. But the further you progress, the more powerful opponents you will encounter. Because of that, you will need a lot of money to upgrade your equipment. Fortunately, there is a way to get currency quickly, namely using Crusaders codes.

With these Roblox codes, you can easily earn extra money. Some of them can even reward you with up to 1000 Gems. Moreover, this feature is available to players before visiting their first dungeon.

Updated February 18, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: Two new codes have just been added, offering Trait Crystals and EXP Potions. Redeem them asap because they won't last forever. Be sure to come back later as this guide serves as a reliable source of new freebies.

All Crusaders Codes

Working Crusaders Codes

  • 4KLikes - Redeem this code to get Trait Crystals (NEW)
  • 3KLikes - Redeem for EXP Potions and Crystals (NEW)

Expired Crusaders Codes

  • 100Likes - Redeem this code to get 1K Gems
  • BETARELEASE - Redeem this code to get 2.5K Gold

When you first start your Crusaders adventure, you will have only a few skills and a wooden weapon. It is quite weak, but still effective for clearing the first stages of the dungeons. To find new equipment, you will have to search for treasure chests and defeat bosses. The latter is a real challenge, but the rewards are worth it. However, to upgrade the equipment or their traits, you will need Gems and Gold, which can be obtained using Crusaders codes.

Just a few of these codes will allow you to upgrade your weapon up to +6, as well as reroll traits that suit your build. However, each code has a validity period, after which it expires and the rewards become no longer available, so players should use them as soon as possible.

How to Redeem Crusaders Codes

As with most other Roblox experiences, redeeming codes in Crusaders is quite simple. You just need to follow these simple steps to get all the free goodies:

  • Launch Crusaders .
  • Then, open the menu by clicking on the corresponding button in the lower right corner.
  • After that, select the Codes option.
  • Finally, enter the code and click the Redeem button to use it.

How to Get More Crusaders Codes

The developers add new Roblox codes to Crusaders as players reach community milestones. In order not to miss more free goodies, make sure to visit the official developer’s page, where you will find information about upcoming updates, events, and new codes:

  • Zephsy X page
  • Crusaders Discord server
  • Crusaders // AS Roblox group

item.title: Final Fantasy 14's Moogle Treasure Trove Is Coming Back
item.description:
Summary

  • The Moogle Treasure Trove event returns in Final Fantasy 14 on February 26.
  • Players complete challenges to earn Irregular Tomestones for rare rewards like the Paissa Earring.
  • The event will last four weeks.

On February 19, Final Fantasy 14 revealed that the Moogle Treasure Trove would return ahead of the Seekers of Eternity content update. Dubbed The Hunt for Phantasmagoria, Final Fantasy 14 players will have just under four weeks, starting on February 26, to complete various challenges and earn rare cosmetic rewards for their collections.

Often taking place before a major content patch, the Moogle Treasure Trove gives Final Fantasy 14 players an easy way to earn rewards that are usually difficult to obtain without help. By completing activities, such as dungeons, alliance raids, and Ocean Fishing, players will earn Irregular Tomestones that can be offered to Itinerant Moogle NPCs found in Ul'dah, Gridania, and Limsa Lominsa in exchange for rare and exclusive rewards. In the previous Moogle Treasure Trove event from October to November 2024, The Hunt for Goetia allowed players to get the exclusive Donut Earring as a glamour item.

Weeks before the launch of Patch 7.2 in late March, Final Fantasy 14 will host another Moogle Treasure Trove event to tide players over. The Hunt For Phantasmagoria will begin on Wednesday, February 26, and conclude before the launch of Patch 7.2 in late March. Given that the previous Moogle Treasure Trove event lasted four weeks, the upcoming Hunt for Phantasmagoria should last for a similar timeframe. Ergo, March 25 will likely be when Patch 7.2 goes live, giving players just under a month to earn cosmetic rewards.

Final Fantasy 14 Announces Moogle Treasure Trove Starting February 26

While the Moogle Treasure Trove is active, Final Fantasy 14 players will earn Irregular Tomestones of Phantasmagoria for completing entries in the Mogpendium, including Weekly Objectives and MiniMog Challenges that reset once per week. The Ultimog Challenge can only be completed once per event but offers the biggest payout of Irregular Tomestones. The Mogpendium challenges will be made public once the Moogle Treasure Trove goes live.

The Paissa Earring is the most expensive reward Final Fantasy 14 players can get this time, which costs 100 Irregular Tomestones of Phantasmagoria. Hard-to-obtain mounts like the Shadow Gwiber and Legendary Kamuy, alongside the Queen's Guard Barding for chocobos, will also be easier to get during the Moogle Treasure Trove. For the first time since the 2021 Hunt For Lore event, the Inferno Jacket glamour item will be available for 50 Irregular Tomestones.

The Moogle Treasure Trove will commence one day after Final Fantasy 14 launches Patch 7.18, which also marks the beginning of the Instax collaboration. Between the Moogle Treasure Trove and the Seekers of Eternity update, Final Fantasy 14 players have a busy time ahead.
